item.description:
Hello WPC Folks,

A few members requested we ask if Shawn - our resident camera sensor cleaner - can come back and get us all in tip top shape for the upcoming spring. So if you have a camera you'd like to have the sensor cleaned on it- please feel free to bring it to the Meetup on Thursday April 28th at 7:30 pm.

Special note: I realize this meetup is "full" -- BUT if you need your sensor cleaned you can come to the meeting even though it says it is full. We will not be limiting the attendance to this meeting-- so everyone and anyone can attend and get this cleaning service. We just ask that you RSVP here is you are planning on having your camera cleaned.

Shawn specializes in Professional, Fully Guaranteed, Safe sensor cleanings. $35.00 ea. (Cleanings are first come - first serve.)

Please pay Shawn directly the night of the event.

Thank you all!

Cheers,

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: He'll be the one cleaning the camera sensors....
item.why: Spring time camera sensor cleaning... "Make the dust bunnies go away!"

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Camera Sensor Cleanings at the Next Photo Meetup
